maze
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  maze.Board
Direct Known Subclasses:
Maze
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a board that has functionality of handling it's walls (i.e. enabling or disabling walls).

Author:
£ukasz Barcikowski, Pawe³ Rendak

Method Detail

getVerticalWalls

public boolean[][] getVerticalWalls()
Gets vertical walls, it is used by MazePanel for drawing those walls.

Returns:
Two dimension array representing vertical walls.

getHorizontalWalls

public boolean[][] getHorizontalWalls()
Gets horizontal walls, it is used by MazePanel for drawing those walls.

Returns:
Two dimension array representing horizontal walls.

getEastWall

public boolean getEastWall(int x,
                           int y)
                    throws OutOfBoardException
Checks the existence of east wall of the cell with coordinates (x,y).

Parameters:
x - X coordinate of the cell.
y - Y coordinate of the cell.
Returns:
True if wall exist, false otherwise.
Throws:
OutOfBoardException - Occurs when desired cell does not belong to board.

setEastWall

protected void setEastWall(int x,
                           int y,
                           boolean exists)
                    throws OutOfBoardException
Sets given wall to existing or non existing state. Value "true" indicates that wall exist, "false" means that there is no wall present.

Parameters:
x - X coordinate of the cell.
y - Y coordinate of the cell.
exists - Existence of the wall.
Throws:
OutOfBoardException - Occurs when desired cell does not belong to board.
